meta.title: PACT Charter School - Coronavirus - Response Plan Information

body.class: site com-sppagebuilder view-page no-layout no-task en-gb ltr sticky-header layout-fluid off-canvas-menu-init

div.a: School Care for Students of Families Working in Critical Sectors Form

div.a: Distance Learning: Who Do I Contact?

div.div:
The information on this page in intended to provide response plan updates for PACT Charter School as it relates to the COVID-19 (coronavirus) outbreak. We will update this page with adjustments to the daily operations of the school as we continue to act in the best interests of our community. Governor Tim Walz and Education Commissioner Mary Cathryn Ricker have announced that all Minnesota public school districts and charter schools will implement a Distance Learning Period beginning on March 30, 2020, until at least April 30, 2020.
Visit the MDE COVID-19 Updates web page for additional guidance.

p.span: At this time, distance learning will continue through at least April 30. Students may not come to school during this time. Distance learning could be extended beyond April 30; this will be determined at a later date. If the order from the governor is allowed to expire, students will return to the classroom on Tuesday, May 5.

div.a: PACT CHARTER SCHOOL DISTANCE LEARNING PLAN

p.span: This plan may be updated as needed. If you have any questions regarding the plan, please contact Amy Erendu, the Executive Director of Education, at a.erendu@pactcharter.org.

div.div:
As new information is confirmed, updates will be communicated to families via email and will also be posted here for quick reference.
April:
6 - Zoom on Chromebooks
March:
29 - Zoom Livestream Lessons
26 - Distance Learning Plan
24 - Student Items Pick Up
23 - Distance Learning Preparation - Secondary
23 - Distance Learning Preparation - Elementary
19 - Distance Learning Planning Status
17 - Meals for Students on Free/Reduced Lunch Program
16 - School Care for Emergency Workers Form
15 - No School or Extracurricular Activities Through March 29
14 - MSHSL Limits Spring Sports; Cancels Tournaments
12 - Spring Break and Coronavirus
11 - Information about COVID-19 (Coronavirus)
Questions regarding COVID-19 and PACT's response plan can be directed to Josh Nyquist (j.nyquist@pactcharter.org), Executive Director of Building Operations.

div.p:
PACT Charter School
7250 East Ramsey Parkway
Ramsey, MN 55303

p.br:
Monday | Wednesday: 8 a.m. - 2 p.m.
Tuesday | Thursday: 8 a.m. - noon
Closed Holidays and Fridays
